Reviews.Title: “overpriced for a dump”
Reviews.Author: hungryEddie
Reviews.Content: read reviews left amsterdam didnt hold hope stairs entrance vertical charged 50 euro key deposit getting door struggle lady reception near impossible worse patio type 2 windows door allowing view doesnt exactly fill confidence staff friendly easy wouldnt recommend hotel fine wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “AWFUL”
Reviews.Author: 187514Martin
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend paid 120 eur night double bedroom absolutely awful paid lot useless soap bathroom facility sleeping top floor discotheque basically night walls shaking loudly music continental breakfast horrible bread ham cheese overpaid awful

Reviews.Title: “To be avoided at all costs!”
Reviews.Author: cindynix
Reviews.Content: stay sleep noisy bar plays thumping music till 5am morning actually beds vibrate trying sleep middle night club onto heaving noisy revellers till 6 morning windows gaps hear dirty bin hadnt emptied huge mouldy growth ceiling bathrooms lastly rude male staff slammed door unable pay checkin yes demand payment checkin checkout people leave paying refuse pay wouldnt blame expensive dive deceived photos promises jacuzzis minibars website outrageously misleading

Reviews.Title: “absolutly the worst hotel i have ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: stefie2011
Reviews.Content: believe hotel actually advertised book friends walked 1st noticed steep flight stairs ahead disgusting red carpet 2nd noticed stench horror movie saying walked vile friends book scared shared receptionist 2nd refunded staying refused stayed little conservatory windows time guest climb concern bit advice book stay dont tempted price shocking hope review helps im complain please advice

Reviews.Title: “Vile hotel NEVER stay here !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Eloise123-123
Reviews.Content: stayed hotels poorest countrys pound night hotels thailand amsterdam 6 friends 3 girls 3 guys booked call hotel unsafe guys stay due using wouldnt refund joke didnt sleep covers due knowing advice stay

Reviews.Title: “what are you all moaning about!!!!”
Reviews.Author: good_4_u088
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights friend paid â£140 inc flights bargain reading past reviews scared arrived steep staircase leading reception lady reception lovely helpful stayed 1 doors hotel steep staircase entrance massive definatly 4 stay clean couldnt location walking distance im travel agent look hotel couldnt understand bad reviews clean base hotel email hotel receptionist apartment space

Reviews.Title: “Impossible to sleep there!”
Reviews.Author: no_sleep_99
Reviews.Content: bit dubious reviews recently stayed days midweek hotel bad considering cheaper hotels amsterdam basic location located edge square bars restaurants nightclubs bar underneath hotel loudest nightclubs closes 3am drunks disperse 400am wasnt soundproof impossible sleep 400 hours relative quiet except pigeons walls 800 am brutally awoken street cleaning trucks sound bars restaurants cleaning thousands bottles thinking staying unless stumble bed zero chance sleep 400 am hotel saying receptionist freindly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Unsecure, Filthy, Unfriendly, Worst Hotel Ever, Don't Go”
Reviews.Author: berwickgail
Reviews.Content: worst hotel amsterdam booked 3 nights arrived climb rubbish staircase call booked 2 twin looking square 2 door closed locked window glass door lock handle kept closed table left mould bathroom beds ceilings bath dirt coming jets jacuzzi style bath time complain reception told leaving hotel booking paying night staying am surprised hotel allowed stay surprised holiday companies minutecom taking bookings minded holiday notice reviews please please notice dont

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all cost”
Reviews.Author: DisgustedAgain
Reviews.Content: desperate stayed photos online didnt represent stayed top top floor overlooking shed roof littered condoms discarded needles fridge found half bottle wine chunk moldy cheese weeks literally clothes bed wore day morning shower brush teeth ran train station

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location , reviews a bit over the top.”
Reviews.Author: MarkDavies
Reviews.Content: dont wrong ritz paying ritz prices arrival reading reviews little worried checked top floor treck carried mine partners hundred stairs beds table chairs fridge tv clean comphy shared facilites clean shower fantasticly warm base 5 days exactly sleep wash location excellent plenty bars shops plenty eat rembrant square tram strait road links city bought 4 day pass 1800 euros worth tram 2030 times city fantastic hotel clean freindly warm ritz style ritz pay price expect base

Reviews.Title: “what a way to celebrate my 40th!”
Reviews.Author: lelHScotland
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel couldnt checked receptionist gone somethin flight stairs reception comin ur life ur hands glass window bottom steep stair level god disgrace filthy smelt damp urine tv broke 1st night partner ex forked extra 4 star hotel round corner location dont chance staying incase 14
